title: Photo of Rahul and Rajiv Gandhi from Abdul Ghaffar Khan’s funeral revived with the same old false narrative
subtitle: The photo was taken at Abdul Ghaffar Khan’s funeral, not at Indira Gandhi’s funeral. Hence the claim made in the post is FALSE.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A photo is being shared widely on social media with a claim that Rahul and Rajiv Gandhi have offered Islamic prayers at Indira Gandhi’s funeral. FACTLY has found that the photo is related to Abdul Ghaffar Khan’s funeral. When the same photo went viral last year with the same claim, FACTLY has written a detailed fact-check article, which can be read here. Now, the image has been revived in the wake of ‘Republic TV‘ Editor Arnab Goswami’s comments on Sonia Gandhi in the context of Palghar lynching incident.

Did you watch our new video?
